title: Waukesha Christmas Parade: SUV Plows Into Crowd, Killing Multiple People
sub_head: Police in Wisconsin said they have recovered vehicle, have person of interest
body:
WAUKESHA, Wis.â€”A red SUV plowed through police barricades and into a Christmas parade here Sunday afternoon, killing multiple people and sending more than 20 injured people to the hospital, police said.
Police have recovered the vehicle and a person of interest is in custody, city police Chief Dan Thompson said. The investigation is ongoing.
